footer.tagline: A small discovery front-end for exploring new and trending videos across the web. Fast, privacy-friendly, and beautiful.
footer.subscribeText: Subscribe to a short monthly update about top videos and channels.

hero.title: ToPlay.lt
hero.subtitle: Discover top videos & channels
hero.description: A modern platform to help you find new, trending, and top videos and channels in the Lithuanian space.

newVideos.title: New videos
newVideos.description: Discover the latest videos from Lithuanian channels. Stay up to date with the newest and most interesting content.

trending.title: Trending
trending.description: Find out which videos are currently most popular. See real-time popularity rankings.

topVideos.title: Top videos
topVideos.description: Browse the highest-rated and most-watched videos. Discover the highest quality content from Lithuanian channels.

channels.title: Top channels
channels.description: Discover the most popular Lithuanian channels by subscriber count, view count, and engagement. Follow channels that create the highest quality content.

language.title: Lithuanian language
language.description: All videos and channels are in Lithuanian. Discover content that is close and understandable in Lithuanian.

community.title: Local community
community.description: We support Lithuanian creators and channels. Help Lithuanian content grow online.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: Have questions or suggestions? Contact us by email or through social networks.
